metadata.title: AKS New Service Account Created
metadata.description: Detects creation of new service accounts which may be used for persistence.

properties.description: Detects when a new service account is created, which can be used for persistence or privilege escalation.
properties.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where Category == "kube-audit"
| where TimeGenerated > ago(5m)
| extend log = parse_json(log_s)
| extend verb = tostring(log.verb)
| extend objectRef = log.objectRef
| extend user = log.user
| extend sourceIPs = log.sourceIPs
| extend responseStatus = log.responseStatus
| where objectRef.resource == "serviceaccounts"
| where verb == "create"
| where responseStatus.code in (200, 201)
| extend
    ServiceAccountName = tostring(objectRef.name),
    Namespace = tostring(objectRef.namespace),
    Username = tostring(user.username),
    UserGroups = tostring(user.groups),
    SourceIP = tostring(sourceIPs[0]),
    ClusterName = Resource
| where not(Username startswith "system:")
| where Namespace !in ("kube-system", "gatekeeper-system", "azure-arc")
| project
    TimeGenerated,
    ClusterName,
    Namespace,
    ServiceAccountName,
    Username,
    SourceIP
| summarize
    FirstSeen = min(TimeGenerated),
    LastSeen = max(TimeGenerated),
    Count = count()
    by ClusterName, Namespace, ServiceAccountName, Username, SourceIP

alertDetailsOverride.alertDescriptionFormat: Service account '{{ServiceAccountName}}' was created in namespace '{{Namespace}}' by user '{{Username}}'.
